Meanwhile, Gigginstown's team orders may prioritize the Ryanair for First Lieutenant, despite Mouse Morris' desire to run him in the Gold Cup. The panel discusses the upcoming Cheltenham race, with Bobsworth being the most likely winner, and Q-Card a strong contender.

The majority of the panel, including Claude, believe Bobbsworth is the most likely winner, with some also considering Silvaniaco Conti and Q Card as potential challengers. Bobs Worth is a strong contender for the Gold Cup with his festival record and recent win, but Silvio Conti's performance in the King George raises questions about his ability to finish the race. Meanwhile, Gigginstown's team orders may prioritize the Ryanair for First Lieutenant, despite Mouse Morris' desire to run him in the Gold Cup. The panel discusses the upcoming Cheltenham race, with Bobsworth being the most likely winner, and Q-Card a strong contender.

modalities.speech: Bobbsworth is the returning favorite to win the Gold Cup, having an unbeaten record at the festival and a strong performance in Ireland after a setback at Haydock. The majority of the panel, including Claude, believe Bobbsworth is the most likely winner, with some also considering Silvaniaco Conti and Q Card as potential challengers. Bobs Worth is a strong contender for the Gold Cup with his festival record and recent win, but Silvio Conti's performance in the King George raises questions about his ability to finish the race. Meanwhile, Gigginstown's team orders may prioritize the Ryanair for First Lieutenant, despite Mouse Morris' desire to run him in the Gold Cup. The panel discusses the upcoming Cheltenham race, with Bobsworth being the most likely winner, and Q-Card a strong contender.
